verses.verse: Now Elisha<WH477> had spoken<WH1696> to the woman,<WH802> whose son<WH1121> he had restored to life,<WH2421> saying,<WH559> "Arise,<WH6965> and go,<WH3212> you and your household,<WH1004> and stay<WH1481> for a while wherever<WH834> you can;<WH1481> for Yahweh<WH3068> has called<WH7121> for a famine.<WH7458> It shall also come<WH935> on the land<WH776> seven<WH7651> years.<WH8141>"

The rest<WH3499> of the acts<WH1697> of Joram,<WH3141> and all that he did,<WH6213> aren't<WH3789> they written in the book<WH5612> of the chronicles<WH1697> of the kings<WH4428> of Judah?<WH3063>
